trans-unit.source: Warning Messages

seg-source.mrk: Warning Messages

target.mrk: Messages d'avertissement

trans-unit.source: The following warning messages can be displayed in the health check (<MadCap:xref href="#health_warning_messages" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: The following warning messages can be displayed in the health check (<MadCap:xref href="#health_warning_messages" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Les messages d'avertissement suivants peuvent être affichés dans le contrôle de l'état (<MadCap:xref href="#health_warning_messages" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

trans-unit.source: Description of health warning messages

seg-source.mrk: Description of health warning messages

target.mrk: Description des messages d'avertissement des vérifications

trans-unit.source: Name

seg-source.mrk: Name

target.mrk: Nom

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: ADE Server running on a Virtualized server.

seg-source.mrk: ADE Server running on a Virtualized server.

target.mrk: Le serveur ADE fonctionne sur un serveur virtualisé.

trans-unit.source: On virtual platforms, performance cannot be exactly determined, since resources are shared with others virtual machines. For maximum performance, use a dedicated physical server.

seg-source.mrk: On virtual platforms, performance cannot be exactly determined, since resources are shared with others virtual machines.
For maximum performance, use a dedicated physical server.

target.mrk: Il n’est pas possible de déterminer avec exactitude les performances d’un serveur virtualisé, car les ressources sont partagées avec d’autres machines virtuelles.
Pour une performance maximum, utilisez un serveur physique dédié.

trans-unit.source: Hot backup mode has been running for X minutes <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(ALN agents are waiting).</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: Hot backup mode has been running for X minutes <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(ALN agents are waiting).</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: Le mode sauvegarde à chaud est en cours depuis X minutes <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(Les agents ALN sont en attente).</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: The hot backup is in progress.

seg-source.mrk: The hot backup is in progress.

target.mrk: La sauvegarde à chaud est en cours.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Note that during the hot backup of a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> configuration, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> agents backup is unavailable.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Note that during the hot backup of a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> configuration, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> agents backup is unavailable.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Notez que pendant la sauvegarde à chaud d'une configuration <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" />, la sauvegarde des agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> n'est pas disponible.</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: ADE Server is not backed up nor snapshotted.

seg-source.mrk: ADE Server is not backed up nor snapshotted.

target.mrk: Le serveur ADE n'est ni sauvegardé ni snapshotté.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots and backups are important to recover your server in case of trouble. This warning is not displayed on mirrored configurations.

seg-source.mrk: Snapshots and backups are important to recover your server in case of trouble.
This warning is not displayed on mirrored configurations.

target.mrk: Les snapshots et les sauvegardes sont importants pour restaurer votre serveur en cas de problème.
Cet avertissement n’est pas affiché sur les configurations miroir.

trans-unit.source: ADE Server has been backed up X days ago.

seg-source.mrk: ADE Server has been backed up X days ago.

target.mrk: Le serveur ADE a été sauvegardé il y a X jours.

trans-unit.source: You should verify why the last server backup took place so long ago.

seg-source.mrk: You should verify why the last server backup took place so long ago.

target.mrk: Vous devriez vérifier pourquoi la dernière sauvegarde du serveur a eu lieu il y a si longtemps.

trans-unit.source: Database and block repositories should be stored on separate volumes for optimal performance.

seg-source.mrk: Database and block repositories should be stored on separate volumes for optimal performance.

target.mrk: La base de données et les répertoires de stockage des blocs doivent être sur des volumes différents afin d'optimiser les performances.

trans-unit.source: Since database should be stored on SSD, having both the database and the repositories on the same volume is probably a configuration error.

seg-source.mrk: Since database should be stored on SSD, having both the database and the repositories on the same volume is probably a configuration error.

target.mrk: Comme la base de données doit être stockée sur SSD, avoir à la fois la base de données et les répertoires de stockage sur le même volume est certainement une erreur de configuration.

trans-unit.source: Using self-signed SSL certificate.

seg-source.mrk: Using self-signed SSL certificate.

target.mrk: Utilisation du certificat SSL auto-signé.

trans-unit.source: ADE generates and self-signs a SSL certificate. For improved security, you should replace it by our own certificate.

seg-source.mrk: ADE generates and self-signs a SSL certificate.
For improved security, you should replace it by our own certificate.

target.mrk: Le serveur ADE génère et signe lui-même un certificat SSL.
Pour une sécurité améliorée, vous devriez le remplacer par votre propre certificat.

trans-unit.source: Replication source is on the same host as the server. Be carefull with this configuration: hardware failure could damage both ADE Servers

seg-source.mrk: Replication source is on the same host as the server.
Be carefull with this configuration: hardware failure could damage both ADE Servers

target.mrk: La source de réplication est sur le même système que le serveur.
Attention une panne matérielle pourrait donc endommager les deux serveurs ADE.

trans-unit.source: Replication mainly aims at protecting data using redundancy on another location. Thus having both mirrors on the same host, or storing data on the same disk array is not recommended.

seg-source.mrk: Replication mainly aims at protecting data using redundancy on another location.
Thus having both mirrors on the same host, or storing data on the same disk array is not recommended.

target.mrk: La réplication vise principalement à protéger les données grâce à la redondance des données dans un autre endroit.
Ainsi la configuration de deux miroirs sur le même hôte, ou du stockage de données sur la même baie de disques n'est pas recommandée.

trans-unit.source: Replication destination is on the same host as the server. Be carefull with this configuration: hardware failure could damage both ADE Servers.

seg-source.mrk: Replication destination is on the same host as the server.
Be carefull with this configuration: hardware failure could damage both ADE Servers.

target.mrk: La destination de réplication est sur le même système que le serveur.
Attention une panne matérielle pourrait donc endommager les deux serveurs ADE.

trans-unit.source: Replication mainly aims at protecting data using redundancy on another location. Thus having both mirrors on the same host, or storing data on the same disks array is not recommended.

seg-source.mrk: Replication mainly aims at protecting data using redundancy on another location.
Thus having both mirrors on the same host, or storing data on the same disks array is not recommended.

target.mrk: La réplication vise principalement à protéger les données grâce à la redondance des données dans un autre endroit.
Ainsi la configuration de deux miroirs sur le même hôte, ou du stockage de données sur la même baie de disques n'est pas recommandée.

trans-unit.source: SSD does not support the TRIM command.

seg-source.mrk: SSD does not support the TRIM command.

target.mrk: SSD ne supporte pas la commande TRIM.

trans-unit.source: TRIM is essential to guarantee constant SSD performance and reliability over the years. This message indicates that your device does not support the feature.

seg-source.mrk: TRIM is essential to guarantee constant SSD performance and reliability over the years.
This message indicates that your device does not support the feature.

target.mrk: TRIM est essentiel pour garantir une performance et une fiabilité constantes de votre SSD au fil du temps.
Ce message indique que votre matériel ne supporte pas cette fonctionnalité.

trans-unit.source: Database commits are too long (average is X seconds). Please move Core database to SSD.

seg-source.mrk: Database commits are too long (average is X seconds).
Please move Core database to SSD.

target.mrk: Les enregistrements dans la base de données sont trop longs (en moyenne : X secondes).
Veuillez déplacer la base sur SSD.

trans-unit.source: The seek time of a SSD device is much faster than the seek time of an usual hard drive. It is mandatory to move the database to an SSD device, since database usage is mostly random access pattern.

seg-source.mrk: The seek time of a SSD device is much faster than the seek time of an usual hard drive.
It is mandatory to move the database to an SSD device, since database usage is mostly random access pattern.

target.mrk: Le temps de recherche d'un SSD est beaucoup plus court que le temps de recherche d'un disque dur habituel.
Il est obligatoire de déplacer la base de données sur un SSD, car la base de données est utilisée principalement en mode d’accès aléatoire des données.

trans-unit.source: Evaluation license (X days remaining)

seg-source.mrk: Evaluation license (X days remaining)

target.mrk: Licence d'évaluation (X jours restant)

trans-unit.source: or

seg-source.mrk: or

target.mrk: ou

trans-unit.source: License expire in X days

seg-source.mrk: License expire in X days

target.mrk: La licence arrive à expiration dans X jours

trans-unit.source: or

seg-source.mrk: or

target.mrk: ou

trans-unit.source: Expired license.

seg-source.mrk: Expired license.

target.mrk: Licence expirée.

trans-unit.source: Please contact your reseller to get a new license file.

seg-source.mrk: Please contact your reseller to get a new license file.

target.mrk: Contactez votre revendeur pour obtenir un nouveau fichier de licence.

trans-unit.source: Fail to determine license info.

seg-source.mrk: Fail to determine license info.

target.mrk: Impossible de déterminer les informations de licence.

trans-unit.source: Check that the license server is running.

seg-source.mrk: Check that the license server is running.

target.mrk: Vérifiez que le serveur de licence est lancé.

trans-unit.source: CPU power scheme is set to instead of "Performance" mode.

seg-source.mrk: CPU power scheme is set to instead of "Performance" mode.

target.mrk: Le mode de gestion d'alimentation de votre CPU est positionné à au lieu de "performance".

trans-unit.source: On heavy load, a CPU set to performance mode performs more DB operations per second.

seg-source.mrk: On heavy load, a CPU set to performance mode performs more DB operations per second.

target.mrk: Lorsque la charge est importante, un processeur positionné en mode performance effectue un nombre plus élevé d’opérations de base de données par seconde.

trans-unit.source: Snapshot not supported (LVM not installed)

seg-source.mrk: Snapshot not supported (LVM not installed)

target.mrk: La fonctionnalité Snapshot n'est pas supportée (LVM non installé)

trans-unit.source: or

seg-source.mrk: or

target.mrk: ou

trans-unit.source: Snapshot not supported (old LVM version).

seg-source.mrk: Snapshot not supported (old LVM version).

target.mrk: La fonctionnalité Snapshot n'est pas supportée (version LVM ancienne).

trans-unit.source: Please install LVM2 with version 2.02.95 or more.

seg-source.mrk: Please install LVM2 with version 2.02.95 or more.

target.mrk: Installez LVM2 avec la version 2.02.95 ou supérieure.

trans-unit.source: Snapshot not supported (some paths cannot be protected).

seg-source.mrk: Snapshot not supported (some paths cannot be protected).

target.mrk: La fonctionnalité Snapshot n'est pas supportée (certains chemins ne peuvent pas être protégés).

trans-unit.source: All paths must be located on a volume that can be snapshotted.

seg-source.mrk: All paths must be located on a volume that can be snapshotted.

target.mrk: Tous les chemins doivent être situés sur un volume qui supporte les snapshots.

trans-unit.source: Snapshot not supported.

seg-source.mrk: Snapshot not supported.

target.mrk: La fonctionnalité Snapshot n'est pas supportée.

trans-unit.source: Check your file system and configuration.

seg-source.mrk: Check your file system and configuration.

target.mrk: Vérifiez votre système de fichiers et votre configuration.

trans-unit.source: Some repositories share the same volume (performance issue).

seg-source.mrk: Some repositories share the same volume (performance issue).

target.mrk: Certains espaces de stockage partagent le même volume (problème de performance).

trans-unit.source: Block files should be stored on different volumes to increase performance. Having several repositories pointing to the same volume is probably a configuration error.

seg-source.mrk: Block files should be stored on different volumes to increase performance.
Having several repositories pointing to the same volume is probably a configuration error.

target.mrk: Les fichiers blocs doivent être stockés sur des volumes séparés afin d’augmenter les performances.
Avoir plusieurs répertoires pointant sur le même volume est probablement une erreur de configuration.

trans-unit.source: Check SSD configuration. System considers it as a Disk, not an SSD.

seg-source.mrk: Check SSD configuration.
System considers it as a Disk, not an SSD.

target.mrk: Vérifiez la configuration SSD.
Le système le considère comme un disque, et non un SSD.

trans-unit.source: The system is not correctly configured or the disk controller firmware is not aware of SSD or does not fully support SSD.

seg-source.mrk: The system is not correctly configured or the disk controller firmware is not aware of SSD or does not fully support SSD.

target.mrk: Le système n’est pas correctement configuré, ou le firmware du contrôleur de disque ne reconnaît pas le SSD ou ne supporte pas le SSD.

trans-unit.source: Unable to check if an update is available.

seg-source.mrk: Unable to check if an update is available.

target.mrk: Impossible de vérifier si une mise à jour est disponible.

trans-unit.source: ADE fails to contact the server to check for update. Check the firewall or disable the notification about new releases from the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: ADE fails to contact the server to check for update.

Check the firewall or disable the notification about new releases from the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: ADE ne parvient pas à contacter le serveur pour vérifier les mises à jour.

Vérifiez le pare-feu ou désactivez la notification des nouvelles versions dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: New release available (only available for version X and above)

seg-source.mrk: New release available (only available for version X and above)

target.mrk: Nouvelle version disponible (seulement pour la version X et supérieure)

trans-unit.source: A new release is available but ADE must be upgraded to version X before upgrading to the last version.

seg-source.mrk: A new release is available but ADE must be upgraded to version X before upgrading to the last version.

target.mrk: Une nouvelle version est disponible, mais vous devez mettre à jour ADE d’abord vers la version X avant la dernière version.

trans-unit.source: New optional release available

seg-source.mrk: New optional release available

target.mrk: Nouvelle version optionnelle disponible

trans-unit.source: A new release is available. Download it and install it.

seg-source.mrk: A new release is available.
Download it and install it.

target.mrk: Une nouvelle version est disponible.
Téléchargez la nouvelle version et installez-la.
